# The `IRAttribute` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Public Static Functions

### hasTrivialInitializer() {#aa3a4aef2a8552613042d8c85ff5d22b3}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;Attribute::AttrKind AK, typename BaseType, typename AAType&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>static bool llvm::IRAttribute&lt; AK, BaseType, AAType &gt;::hasTrivialInitializer ()</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Most boolean <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/irattribute">IRAttribute</a> AAs don&#39;t do anything non-trivial in their initializers while non-boolean ones often do.

Subclasses can change this.
